messages: Oh hi.  I heard there was a new skeleton in town and I had come see what the commotion is about.  Takiyasha is quite popular.
Takiyasha's magic is quite powerful and grants us skeletons invincibility while dashing.  You should try it sometime!
Nice job making it farther than I did.  I was shot down by a magic archer and Takiyasha brought my remaining life essence here.
Good luck my ossified amigo.  Worst case, you'll join me in ethereal form.
